attributes.action: remove the breed ban and replace it with a license system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Breed bans should be removed and replaced with a license system, working similar to gun licenses in the UK.

Any and all dogs have the potential to be dangerous, not just the lock-jaw, and fighting dogs that have ownership restrictions and are currently banned from breeding in the UK.

In fact, these "dangerous" breeds are no more deadly then a mouse provided they are handled and trained correctly. Therefore the danger lies in the owner, and not the breed.

A dog ownership/breeding license for these said breeds would be a lot more beneficial for not only the safety of the public, but also the breeds themselves.

We shouldn't punish a breed/dog for the mistakes, intentional or otherwise, of the owner.
